trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for data pager field types, which represent a navigation control for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fungerer som basisklassen for personsøker feltet datatyper som representerer en navigasjonskontroll for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DataPagerField class serves as the base class for all data pager field types.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataPagerField fungerer som basisklasse for alle personsøker feltet datatyper.

trans-unit.source: Data pager fields are used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control to represent a navigation control.
trans-unit.target: Personsøker datafeltene som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>kontrollen til å representere en navigasjonskontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: Use the classes that are derived from DataPagerField to select which type of pager is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk klassene som er avledet fra DataPagerField velge hvilken type personsøker vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists available data pager field types.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser tilgjengelige personsøker feltet datatyper.

trans-unit.source: |Pager field type|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>|Lets users navigate through data pages one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>|Lets users select a page by page number.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField>|Lets page developers create a custom paging UI.| You can derive from the DataPagerField class to create additional pager field types.
trans-unit.target: | Personsøker felttypen | Beskrivelse | |----------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>| Tillater at brukere gå gjennom dataene sider én side om gangen, eller for å gå til siden første eller siste. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>| Tillater at brukere velger en side ved side-nummeret. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField>| Gjør at siden utviklere med å opprette en egendefinert Bla Brukergrensesnittet. | Du kan være avledet fra klassen DataPagerField til å opprette flere personsøker typer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> class is abstract, you cannot create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> object directly.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>klassen er abstrakt, du kan ikke opprette en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>objekt direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is typically called by the constructor of a derived class to initialize the properties that are defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren kalles vanligvis av konstruktøren avledede klassens initialisere egenskapene som er definert i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the current object that is derived from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kopi av det gjeldende objektet som er avledet fra <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The CloneField method is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.CloneFields%2A> method to create a copy of the current object that is derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CloneField er helper metoden som brukes med <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.CloneFields%2A>metoden for å opprette en kopi av det gjeldende objektet som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.CloneFields%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a copy of the current object, the CloneField method first creates a new instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CreateField%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette en kopi av det gjeldende objektet metoden CloneField først oppretter en ny forekomst av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>objektet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CreateField%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CreateField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>

trans-unit.source: Then it calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CopyProperties%2A> method to copy the property values of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Og kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CopyProperties%2A>metode for å kopiere egenskapsverdiene for gjeldende objekt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CopyProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En kopi av gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties of the current object derived from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Overfører egenskaper for det gjeldende objektet som er avledet fra <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref> til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The CopyProperties method is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A> method to copy the properties of the current object derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> object created by the method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CopyProperties er helper metoden som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A>metode for å kopiere egenskaper for det gjeldende objektet som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>objektet er opprettet av metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to copy the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Objektet du vil kopiere egenskaper for gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: object to.
trans-unit.target: objektet som.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates the user interface (UI) controls for the data pager field object and adds them to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, oppretter brukeren brukergrensesnittet (UI) kontroller for dataobjektet for personsøker felt og legger dem til den angitte beholderen.

trans-unit.source: The CreateDataPagers method is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.CreatePagerFields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create the UI controls for the data pager field.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateDataPagers er helper metoden som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.CreatePagerFields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å opprette Brukergrensesnittet kontrollerer for personsøker datafeltet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.CreatePagerFields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The container that is used to store the controls.
trans-unit.target: Beholderen som brukes til å lagre kontrollene.

trans-unit.source: The index of the first record on the page.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den første posten på siden.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items on a single page.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall elementer på én side.

trans-unit.source: The total number of items.
trans-unit.target: Totalt antall elementer.

trans-unit.source: The index of the data pager field in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for personsøker datafelt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields*>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields*>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates an empty object that is derived <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, oppretter du et tomt objekt som er avledet <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The CreateField method is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A> method to create an empty object that is derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateField er helper metoden som brukes med <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A>metoden til å opprette et tomt objekt som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> object is copied into the empty object.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>objektet kopieres til tom objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>

trans-unit.source: An empty object that is derived from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Et tomt objekt som er avledet fra <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the data pager that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> object is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til datapersonsøkere som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref> objekt er knyttet til.

trans-unit.source: The DataPager reference is internally set when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.OnInsertComplete%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Referansen DataPager internt angis når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.OnInsertComplete%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.OnInsertComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the data pager field.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som inneholder data personsøker-feltet.

trans-unit.source: Creates a URL that contains a query string field that has the specified page number.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en URL-adresse som spørringen streng som inneholder er det angitte tallet.

trans-unit.source: The GetQueryStringNavigateUrl method is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> pager fields to create the target URL for each button of the pager field.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetQueryStringNavigateUrl brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>personsøker felt for å opprette URL-adresse for målet for hver knapp i feltet personsøker.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>

trans-unit.source: The target URL includes a query string field that contains a name/value pair.
trans-unit.target: Målet URL-adressen inneholder et felt for spørringen streng som inneholder et navn/verdi-par.

trans-unit.source: The name is the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, and the value represents the value of `pageNumber`.
trans-unit.target: Navnet er verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>representerer verdien for egenskapen og verdien `pageNumber`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The target page number.
trans-unit.target: Target-sidetallet.

trans-unit.source: The target URL.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen for målet.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, handles events that occur in the data pager field object.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, håndterer hendelser som forekommer i dataene personsøker field-objektet.

trans-unit.source: The HandleEvent method is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to handle events that occur in the pager field object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden HandleEvent er helper metoden som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å håndtere hendelser som skjer i personsøker field-objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> object is tracking its view-state changes.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref> objektet sporer visningsstatus endringene.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> object is tracking its view-state changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref> objektet sporer visningsstatus endringene; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information that was saved previously.
trans-unit.target: Gjenoppretter visningsstatus informasjon som er lagret tidligere.

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method restores view-state information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> object that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.SaveViewState%2A> method during a previous page request.
trans-unit.target: Metoden LoadViewState gjenoppretter visningsstatus informasjon for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>objekt som er lagret av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.SaveViewState%2A>metoden under en tidligere sideforespørsel.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.SaveViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>

trans-unit.source: This method is primarily used by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] infrastruktur og skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollutviklere kan imidlertid overstyre denne metoden hvis du vil angi hvordan en egendefinert serverkontroll gjenoppretter visningstilstanden.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET oversikt over tilstand](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The saved view-state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: Visningsstatusen verdiene for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref uid="langword_csharp_FieldChanged" name="FieldChanged" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref uid="langword_csharp_FieldChanged" name="FieldChanged" href=""> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The OnFieldChanged method raises an event that indicates that the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> object has changed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnFieldChanged opphøyer en hendelse som angir at tilstanden til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>objektet er endret.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property cause this event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>egenskapen føre til at denne-hendelse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes to properties in derived types also raise this event when state changes occur.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i egenskaper i avledede typer opphøyer også denne hendelsen når det gjøres tilstandsendringer.

trans-unit.source: The OnFieldChanged method enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnFieldChanged aktiverer avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the query string field has been evaluated.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om feltet spørringen streng er evaluert.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> pager fields use the QueryStringHandled property to determine whether the query string field has been evaluated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>personsøker felt Bruk QueryStringHandled-egenskapen til å fastslå om streng-feltet for spørringen er evaluert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>

trans-unit.source: If QueryStringHandled is `false`, the pager field class processes the page number that is contained in the query string field.
trans-unit.target: Hvis QueryStringHandled `false`, personsøker feltklassen behandler sidetallet som ligger i spørringen streng-feltet.

trans-unit.source: It also updates the page properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: Oppdateres også siden egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: The pager field class uses this property only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.QueryStringValue%2A> property is not an empty string or `null`.
trans-unit.target: Klassen personsøker feltet bruker denne egenskapen bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.QueryStringValue%2A>egenskapen er ikke en tom streng eller `null`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.QueryStringValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the query string field has been evaluated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis feltet spørringen strengen er evaluert; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the query string field from the URL of the request.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien i feltet spørringen strengen fra URL-adressen for forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is not an empty string or `null`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control uses the HTTP GET command to navigate through the pages.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen er ikke en tom streng eller `null`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>kontrollen bruker HTTP GET-kommando for å gå gjennom sidene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A query string field that consists of a name/value pair is added to the URL of the page.
trans-unit.target: Et felt for spørringen streng som består av et navn/verdi-par legges til URL-adressen på siden.

trans-unit.source: The QueryStringValue property retrieves the value of the query string field from the URL of the request.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen QueryStringValue henter verdien i feltet spørringen streng fra URL-adressen for forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: The QueryStringValue property contains the requested page number.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen QueryStringValue inneholder det forespurte sidetallet.

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> pager fields to evaluate the index of the first record for the page of data requested.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>personsøker felt for å evaluere indeksen for den første posten for den forespurte data-siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField>

trans-unit.source: The page properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control are then updated.
trans-unit.target: Siden egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>kontrollen oppdateres deretter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: The value of the query string field.
trans-unit.target: Verdien i feltet spørringen streng.

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes that were made to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> object's view state.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer endringer ble gjort i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref> objektets visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the object, the SaveViewState method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen visningsstatusen som er knyttet til objektet SaveViewState returneres `null`.

trans-unit.source: The SaveViewState method is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SaveViewState brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: The view-state changes for the control.
trans-unit.target: Visningsstatusen endringer for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> object is tracking its view-state changes.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref> objektet sporer visningsstatus endringene.

trans-unit.source: The IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState interface property uses the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState grensesnittet bruker verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.IsTrackingViewState%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.IsTrackingViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This contains the actual implementation and can be extended by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Dette inneholder den faktiske implementeringen og kan utvides av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> object is tracking its view-state changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref> objektet sporer visningsstatus endringene; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information that was saved previously.
trans-unit.target: Gjenoppretter visningsstatus informasjon som er lagret tidligere.

trans-unit.source: The IStateManager.LoadViewState interface method invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.LoadViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Grensesnittmetoden IStateManager.LoadViewState aktiverer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.LoadViewState%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.LoadViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This contains the actual implementation and can be extended by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Dette inneholder den faktiske implementeringen og kan utvides av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: The saved view-state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: Visningsstatusen verdiene for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes that were made to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> object's view state.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer endringer ble gjort i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref> objektets visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The IStateManager.SaveViewState interface method invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Grensesnittmetoden IStateManager.SaveViewState aktiverer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.SaveViewState%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.SaveViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This contains the actual implementation and can be extended by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Dette inneholder den faktiske implementeringen og kan utvides av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: The view-state changes for the control.
trans-unit.target: Visningsstatusen endringer for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Causes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> object to track changes to its view state so that they can be stored in the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.ViewState*> property and persisted across requests for the same page.
trans-unit.target: Gjør den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref> objekt for å spore endringer i visningsstatusen slik at de kan lagres i kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.ViewState*>egenskapen og faste på tvers av forespørsler for samme side.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.ViewState*>

trans-unit.source: The IStateManager.TrackViewState interface method invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.TrackViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Grensesnittmetoden IStateManager.TrackViewState aktiverer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.TrackViewState%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.TrackViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This contains the actual implementation and can be extended by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Dette inneholder den faktiske implementeringen og kan utvides av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: Causes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> object to track changes to its view state so that they can be stored in the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.ViewState*> property and persisted across requests for the same page.
trans-unit.target: Gjør den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref> objekt for å spore endringer i visningsstatusen slik at de kan lagres i kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.ViewState*>egenskapen og faste på tvers av forespørsler for samme side.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.ViewState*>

trans-unit.source: The TrackViewState method internally sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property to `true` and invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState%2A> method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.ViewState%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden TrackViewState internt angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.IsTrackingViewState%2A>egenskapen `true` og aktiverer det <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState%2A>metode for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.ViewState%2A>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.ViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.IsTrackingViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of state information that enables you to save and restore the view state of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> object across multiple requests for the same page.
trans-unit.target: Henter en ordliste for statusinformasjon som gjør mulig å lagre og gjenopprette visningsstatusen for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref> objektet på tvers av flere forespørsler om samme side.

trans-unit.source: A data pager field's view state is the accumulation of all its property values.
trans-unit.target: Et data personsøker felt visningsstatus er summen av alle egenskapsverdiene.

trans-unit.source: To preserve values across HTTP requests for the same page, ASP.NET server controls use this property to store the property values.
trans-unit.target: Verdier på tvers av HTTP-forespørsler for samme side, ASP.NET serverkontroller å bruke denne egenskapen til å lagre egenskapsverdiene.

trans-unit.source: The values are stored in an HTML hidden input element on the page.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene som er lagret i et HTML skjult inndata-element på siden.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET View State Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET visningen tilstand oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: By default, view state is enabled for all server controls, but there are circumstances when you might want to disable it.
trans-unit.target: Som standard visningsstatus er aktivert for alle serverkontroller, men det finnes tilfeller når du vil deaktivere den.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Performance Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET ytelse oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om ordlister og hvordan de brukes, se [samlinger og datastrukturer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> view-state information.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref> visningsstatus informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a data pager field is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om et datafelt for personsøker gjengis.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> is rendered; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref> er gjengitte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
